Title: BetterTime
Description:
Are the in-world time periods a little too obtuse for you? Are you sometimes confused as to why it's suddenly nighttime? BetterTime is the mod for you!

Includes:
- Day and Night cycle trackers with indicators for the current time
- An actual time digital clock with 12- or 24-hour display
- A simplified mode which just adds the clock to the Qud-style time period
